other_tests.procedure_name: High-resolution CT scan of the chest
other_tests.findings: Multiple air-filled lung cysts and a granuloma within the right lung.

other_tests.procedure_name: CT scan of abdomen and pelvis
other_tests.findings: Evidence of a previous partial left nephrectomy, a 2-cm tumor, and multiple bilateral renal lesions less than 1 cm in diameter with some lesions demonstrating enhancement suggesting they were solid masses.
other_tests.changes_over_time: In May 2001, CT scans revealed 3 tumors on her right kidney, which were treated with surgical enucleation.

other_tests.procedure_name: Histopathologic examination of the facial papules
other_tests.findings: Multiple anastomosing strands of 2 to 4 epithelial cells originating from the central portion of hair follicles, consistent with the diagnosis of fibrofolliculoma.

other_tests.procedure_name: Biopsies of lesions suspected as fibrofolliculomas
other_tests.findings: Seven individuals exhibited multiple fibrofolliculomas, two of whom had a history of spontaneous pneumothorax and/or lung cysts identified on subsequent high-resolution CT scans.
